content: About the event The Dialysis Care Center is pleased to invite community members to DCC Lobby Days. This is a great opportunity for individuals seeking to expand their knowledge of dialysis. The events will feature in-depth discussions on various dialysis options, covering the respective advantages and drawbacks of each modality. Attendees will be given the opportunity to explore and identify the most appropriate dialysis method available at the Dialysis Care Center, tailored to meet the specific healthcare needs of patients. We encourage community members to participate in these informative sessions and gain valuable insights into the dialysis treatment process. Event Details Date:July 04, 2025 (First Friday of every month) Time: 1:00 PM - 3:00 PM Where: Dialysis Care Center Homer Glen-network Google Maps Location: Jewel Strip Mall | 14146 S. Bell Road, Homer Glen, IL 60491 For any inquiries, please reach out to us via email at homemodalityedu@dccdialysis.com. We are here to assist you!
title: DCC Lobby Days - Dialysis Care Center
